item.title: Packaging
item.description: Overview The Unity side of the project can be built as a package for the Unity Package Manager. Releases Release numbers use SemVer. The version is to be put in the filename and the package.json file. The intention is that each release corresponds to a commit. To this end if you are making a new release version of the package: Make sure you have no modified files (check your git status - the script does this for you) Add a tag on your current commit with the release number, push the tag to the origin repo Building (Script) There’s a simple build script included in the project.
